src:
Juventus Lempar Tawaran untuk Isco di Januari 2020
01 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Serie A, Juventus diberitakan masih penasaran terhadap sosok Isco. Si Nyonya Tua berencana melepaskan tawaran untuk playmaker Real Madrid itu di bulan Januari nanti.
Sejak musim lalu, nama Isco kerap digosipkan diminati Juventus. Sang playmaker dinilai cocok untuk menambah kekuatan lini serang Juventus.
Pada musim panas kemarin, Si Nyonya Tua sempat mencoba untuk menawar Isco. Namun Real Madrid enggan melepas sang pemain.
Dilansir Calciomercato, Juventus masih menaruh hati terhadap Isco. Mereka tertarik untuk merekrut sang playmaker di bulan Januari nanti.

Simak manuver yang disusun Real Madrid untuk merekrut Isco di bawah ini.
text:
Juventus Throw Bids for Isco in January 2020
Nov 01 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Serie A club, Juventus reportedly still curious about the figure of Isco. The Old Lady plans to release the offer for the Real Madrid playmaker in January.
Since last season, the name Isco is often rumored to be in demand by Juventus. The playmaker is considered suitable to add strength to the Juventus attack line.
Last summer, the Old Lady tried to offer Isco. But Real Madrid are reluctant to let go of the player.
Reported by Calciomercato, Juventus still put their hearts towards Isco. They are interested in recruiting the playmaker in January.

Check out the maneuver compiled by Real Madrid to recruit Isco below.
